description.ko: 단단한 흑요석 형태가 혼란스러우면서도 균형 잡힌 흑백 글리치로 녹아드는 디지털 붕괴와 기하학적 정밀도에 관한 연구입니다.
description.en: A study in digital decay and geometric precision, where a solid obsidian form dissolves into a chaotic yet balanced monochrome glitch.

prompt: A massive, brutalist obsidian #1A1A1A sphere suspended in a stark #FFFFFF void, perpetually fracturing into a cascade of sharp geometric shards and vertical #C0C0C0 scanline glitches. The composition features high-contrast monochrome complexity with #808080 digital noise textures. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on shifting black glass surfaces. Razor-sharp shadows emphasize the chaos within order, capturing the perfect balance created by fragments of a collapsing digital reality, with scanlines cutting through the geometric abstraction.
